alert.note: Alert for Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 21 at 2:37PM PST until December 22 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Nezperce, Gifford, Pomeroy, Winchester, Lewiston, Lapwai, Craigmont, Lewiston Grade, Culdesac, Alpowa Summit, Peck, Kamiah, Clarkston, and Soldiers Meadow Road. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to Noon PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
